text: I unpacked the first episode of our podcast to share how we are taking a point of view on the market in a pre-launch state. <https://www.meetfathom.com/blog/authenticity-above-all-else-when-starting-a-b2b-marketing-company>

attachments.title: Authenticity Above All Else When Starting a B2B Marketing Company | Fathom
attachments.text: We are on a mission to provide value to B2B content marketers abound. Rewind the VHS version of your content strategy. Let us help you deliver the Netflix experience.
attachments.fallback: Authenticity Above All Else When Starting a B2B Marketing Company | Fathom

elements.text: I unpacked the first episode of our podcast to share how we are taking a point of view on the market in a pre-launch state.

text:
I’m starting a newsletter on Feb 13. Each week, I’ll dig into the Fun Files and dissect one fun B2B marketing campaign and share the lessons. Sign up: <http://NisforNewsletter.com|NisforNewsletter.com>
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 
(Sound on for maximum nostalgia.) #tbt to 1990 when New Kids On the Block released Step by Step. One of their classics. Who knew 31 years later (*audible gasp*), these same lyrics would be applicable to the newest kid on the B2B block? 

STEP 1: We can have lots of fun ... if you sign up
STEP 2: There’s so much we can do ... like go through B2B marketing campaigns that are awesome 
STEP 3: It’s just you and me ... and a few of our closest friends 
STEP 4: I can give you more ... like actionable tips and ideas 
STEP 5: Don’t you know that the time has arrived ... for you to sign up (and confirm subscription)

text:
We all know Search Intent is important. But, there's more to it. 

Ahrefs increased traffic on one of their pages by 677% in 6 months. That's phenomenal growth!

Also, there are 4 types of search intent. I discussed all this in this nifty little thread :thread: Take a look?

<https://twitter.com/debgotwired/status/1357388256657162244?s=19|https://twitter.com/debgotwired/status/1357388256657162244?s=19>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/debgotwired|@debgotwired>: Ahrefs increased traffic on one of their core pages by 677% in just 6 months. That's insane! 

But how? :exploding_head:

They focused on a key concept in SEO, i.e., Search Intent. 

So, what is Search Intent? It's more than what you know. Let's take a look :point_down:

[1/10]
